comments.html: The long term solution is <A HREF="http://www.archive.org" REL="nofollow"/> :)
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: Not really, they have different purposes. Internet Archive does a periodic crawl of the Internet (like Google), allowing you to go back in time and see how things evolved (I've also used it to get pretty old course descriptions from our previous web site :). The WebCite allows you to capture a page at the exact moment when you cite it.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
